name: UNION (itch) (Shin Tategami)
description:
This world is in turmoil, enveloped in darkness. The people live in fear, the creatures stir in anger. It needs unity. It needs a hero. It needs YOU.

UNION takes you into the journey of a wandering soul sent to a new world with only their name and a purpose given to them: to unite the people and dispel the chaos that has polluted the land. Create a vessel for the soul to inhabit, venture through the world, meet new people and unite them under your cause to save this world from evil.

Controls:

Move - Arrow keys

Select - Z

Cancel - X

Sprint - SHIFT

Currently Planned Features:

- Character and weapon customization via items dropped by enemies

- Class switching, allowing the player to learn new techniques 

- Gacha system for unlocking new weapons, characters (no in-game purchases required)

- A large roster of characters to join the player, each with their own personal skills and story arcs

- An expansive, dynamic story that changes based on the player's decisions

This is my first foray into game development, and the first result of over a year of work. Development is slow (mostly due to me working on my own), but progress is being made each day. The demo will offer roughly 1-3 hours of content, and the full game will offer much more. I'm open to any and all suggestions with each demo release, so feel free to leave a comment.

Thanks for checking the game out!
